problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,AC是⊙O的弦,过点C的切线交AB的延长线于点D．若∠D=20°,则∠A的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is the chord of ⊙O, and the tangent passing through point C intersects the extended line of AB at point D. If ∠D = N_0, then the degree of ∠A is ()
raw_answer: 解:连结OC,如图,∵CD为⊙O的切线,∴OC⊥CD,∴∠OCD=90°,而∠D=20°,∴∠COD=70°,∵OA=OC,∴∠A=∠ACO,∴∠COD=∠A+∠ACO=2∠A,∴∠A=\frac{1}{2}×70°=35°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质:圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径．也考查了等腰三角形的性质．
